rawConfiguration.text:
# A **Kentik Default** device indicates that the System Object Identifier for this device does not match any of the [SNMP Profiles](https://github.com/kentik/snmp-profiles) loaded in your [Kentik/ktranslate](https://github.com/kentik/ktranslate) instance. You can modify the existing profiles, or create new ones and load them into your instance by following [these instructions](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/network-performance-monitoring/advanced/snmp-profiles/#private) 

*This page shows the data we are currently collecting on this device using commonly available MIBs.*

nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT latest(device_name) AS 'Device Name', latest(src_addr) as 'Device IP', latest(kentik.snmp.Uptime)/8640000 AS 'Uptime (Days)', latest(SysObjectID) AS 'SysObjectID', latest(entity.type) AS 'Entity Type', latest(instrumentation.name) AS 'Ktranslate Profile', latest(timestamp) AS 'Last Update', latest(PollingHealth) AS 'Polling Health', latest(PollingHealthReason) AS 'Health Reason' WHERE provider IN ('kentik-default','kentik-net-snmp')
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Current CPU Utilization %' WHERE provider in ('kentik-default','kentik-net-snmp')
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Current Memory Utilization %' WHERE provider in ('kentik-default','kentik-net-snmp')

FROM Metric SELECT min(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Min CPU', max(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Max CPU', average(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Average CPU' WHERE provider in ('kentik-default','kentik-net-snmp') TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES

FROM Metric SELECT min(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Min Memory', max(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Max Memory', average(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Average Memory' WHERE provider in ('kentik-default','kentik-net-snmp') TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES

FROM Metric SELECT latest(timestamp) FACET `mib-name` AS 'MIB Name', `mib-table` AS 'MIB Table', metricName AS 'Metric Name', objectIdentifier AS 'OID' WHERE `mib-name` != 'computed' AND provider in ('kentik-default','kentik-net-snmp') SINCE 1 DAY AGO LIMIT MAX

from Metric SELECT min(kentik.snmp.hrSystemProcesses) AS 'Min Process Count', average(kentik.snmp.hrSystemProcesses) AS 'Average Process Count', max(kentik.snmp.hrSystemProcesses) AS 'Max Process Count' where metricName = 'kentik.snmp.hrSystemProcesses' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.IfInUtilization) AS 'RX %', latest(kentik.snmp.IfOutUtilization) AS 'TX %', latest(if_OperStatus) AS 'Operational Status', latest(kentik.snmp.ifInErrorPercent) AS 'RX Error %', latest(kentik.snmp.ifOutErrorPercent) AS 'TX Error %' FACET if_name or if_interface_name AS 'Interface', if_Alias AS 'Interface Alias', if_Speed AS 'Interface Speed' WHERE provider in ('kentik-default','kentik-net-snmp') LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT round(latest(kentik.snmp.hrStorageUsed)*100/latest(kentik.snmp.hrStorageSize),.01) AS 'Used %', round(latest(kentik.snmp.hrStorageSize)*1e-6,.01) AS 'Total MBytes', round(latest(kentik.snmp.hrStorageUsed)*1e-6,.01) AS 'Used MBytes' WHERE `mib-table` = 'hrStorage' FACET storage_description LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT round(latest(kentik.snmp.hrStorageUsed)*100/latest(kentik.snmp.hrStorageSize),.01) AS 'Used %' WHERE `mib-table` = 'hrStorage' FACET storage_description LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES

SELECT round(max(`Used %`),.01) FROM (FROM Metric SELECT (latest(kentik.snmp.hrStorageUsed)*100/latest(kentik.snmp.hrStorageSize)) AS 'Used %' WHERE `mib-table` = 'hrStorage' FACET storage_description, `entity.guid` LIMIT MAX) WHERE `Used %` > 80 FACET storage_description

FROM Metric SELECT round(latest(kentik.snmp.dskTotal)*1e-6,.01) AS 'Total MBytes', round(latest(kentik.snmp.dskUsed)*1e-6,.01) AS 'Used MBytes', round(latest(kentik.snmp.dskPercent),.01) AS 'Used %', round(latest(kentik.snmp.dskPercentNode),.01) AS 'Inodes %' WHERE `mib-table` = 'dsk' FACET dsk_device, dsk_path, dsk_error_msg LIMIT MAX
SELECT max(Used) FROM (FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.dskPercent) AS 'Used %' WHERE `mib-table` = 'dsk' FACET dsk_device, dsk_path, dsk_error_msg LIMIT MAX) WHERE `Used %` >= 80 FACET dsk_path
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.dskPercent) AS 'Used %' WHERE `mib-table` = 'dsk' FACET dsk_path LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.dskPercentNode) AS 'Inodes %' WHERE `mib-table` = 'dsk' FACET dsk_path LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.diskIOLA1) AS 'Disk Total Load %', rate(latest(kentik.snmp.diskIOReads), 1 second) AS 'Current Read IOPS', rate(latest(kentik.snmp.diskIOWrites), 1 second) AS 'Current Write IOPS', rate(latest(kentik.snmp.diskIONReadX), 1 second) AS 'Current Read Bytes/sec', rate(latest(kentik.snmp.diskIONWrittenX), 1 second) AS 'Current Write Bytes/sec' WHERE `mib-table` = 'diskIO' FACET diskIO_device LIMIT MAX
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.diskIOLA1) AS 'Disk Total Load %' WHERE `mib-table` = 'diskIO' FACET diskIO_device LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES

FROM Metric SELECT rate(latest(kentik.snmp.diskIONReadX),1 second) AS 'Read Bytes', rate(latest(kentik.snmp.diskIONWrittenX),1 second) AS 'Write Bytes' WHERE `mib-table` = 'diskIO' FACET diskIO_device LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES

FROM Metric SELECT rate(latest(kentik.snmp.diskIOReads),1 second) AS 'Read IOPS', rate(latest(kentik.snmp.diskIOWrites),1 second) AS 'Write IOPS' WHERE `mib-table` = 'diskIO' FACET diskIO_device LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES
